# Adding inline encoded images support

Adaptive cards support in line images. Usage should be limited because it can increase the card json size enough to impact performance.

The image loaders should support base64 encoded images. Image.memory should be able to load these images. This change means the image utils will support regular images, svg and now in memory base 64 encoded.

https://adaptivecards.microsoft.com/?topic=Image

## Sample JSON loading an image

```json
{
  "version": "1.6",
  "type": "AdaptiveCard",
  "body": [
    {
      "type": "Image",
      "url": "data:image/png;base64,"
    }
  ]
}
```
